item.title: 王爽汇编语言第四版第六章实验源码
item.author: chujj31@gmail.com (chuj)
item.description: assume cs:code,ds:data,ss:stack data segment dw 0123h,0456h,0789h,0abch,0defh,0fedh,0cbah,0987h data ends stack segment dw 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0 stack ends code segment start: mov ax,stack mov ss,ax mov sp,16 mov ax,data mov ds,ax push ds:[0] push ds:[2] pop ds:[2] pop ds:[0] mov ax,4c00h int 21h code ends end start assume cs:code,ds:data,ss:stack data segment dw 0123h,0456h,0123h,0456h,0123h,0456h,0123h,0456h,0123h,0456h,0123h,0456h,0123h,0456h,0123h,0456h stack segment dw 0,0 stack ends code segment start: mov ax,stack mov ss,ax mov sp,16 mov ax,data mov ds,ax push ds:[0]

item.title: 10.14-汇编
item.author: chujj31@gmail.com (chuj)

item.title: 汇编语言环境搭建
item.author: chujj31@gmail.com (chuj)
item.description: 今天花了很多钱买书，《汇编语言》《逆向工程核心原理》和《加密与解密》，花了这么多，不好好看的话，就很亏，所以写个博客防止自己走马观花，同时也
